item.title: About
item.description: Professional Profile Personal Projects HTML to Markdown Tiếng kêu của thú rừng & Buồn vui chuyện nhặt cỏ Tuyên Ngôn Agile - Vietnamese translation of the Agile Manifesto Highly Recommended Professional Profile My Linkedin page Writings: Locations and Places API - Getting started: It is easy to get started with Mastercard Locations and Places APIs Merchant-of-interest Progressive Web App (PWA): An example combination of Mastercard Places API in conjunction with Google Map API
